entry.name: windowNamePrefix
entry.label: Prefix of the window name used for detecting the terminal

entry.name: windowNameSuffix
entry.label: Suffix of the window name used for detecting the terminal

entry.name: windowClassName
entry.label: Suffix of the window name used for detecting the terminal

entry.name: launchCommand
entry.label: Command for launching the terminal application if the window can not be found

entry.name: skipTaskbarSettingEnabled
entry.label: Whether or not the setting for skipping the taskbar should be honored.

entry.name: skipTaskbar
entry.label: Whether or not the window should be shown in the taskbar

entry.name: skipSwitcherSettingEnabled
entry.label: Whether or not the setting for skipping the window switcher should be enabled

entry.name: skipSwitcher
entry.label: Whether or not the window should be shown in the window switcher

entry.name: debugLoggingEnabled
entry.label: Enable this if you wish to perform debug logging.
